title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Design and Evaluation of Digital Game-Based Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of basic scientific theories and relevant professional work experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain a learning objective-game objective mapping model for educational digital games according to four categories.
Learners can apply a digital game design framework reflecting science domain expertise to create a prototype planning document.
Learners can analyze the educational applicability of existing games and propose improvement strategies using a gamification assessment model.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
